characters: THE DEMON ALIENS DESCEND UPON THE POD
A MAGNIFICENT AND BREATHTAKING VIEW OF THE ENORMOUS SHIP,
JASON EMERGES WITH SARRIS, THE TWO LOCKED IN MORTAL COMBA
THE ELABORATE MECHANISM, THE OMEGA 13, UNFOLDS IMPOSSIBLY
PROTECTOR DOCKED IN FRONT OF THEM...
JUST SLOW IT DOWN A LITTLE
GWEN, ALEXANDER AND GUY STANDING ON THE SHIP'S POD PLATFO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The vastness of space. Suddenly a hole in the sky opens w flash and a SPACESHIP rumbles into view. On its hull the USEA PROTECTOR. Magnificent, though on closer inspection shudders ever so slightly, denoting pre-CGI model work on budget. We're watching a TV show.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: We're exiting the time knot now sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 Members of the crew of the USEA PROTECTOR sit in the la 1979-“high-tech” cabin. All of them human except for one, LAZARUS, a cross between a human and a raptor. The crewma exchange relieved smiles.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: We're alive.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: We made it. Captain, we made it!

dialogues.speaker: LAZARUS, (THE ALIEN)
dialogues.text: By Grabthar’s hammer, we live to tell the tale.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Systems register functional.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: All systems are working, Captain. Captain?... They all turn to look at THE CAPTAIN, who turns to reveal dramatically. Good looking. His acting is classic Charlto take-no-prisoners style. He looks around the command deck worried, almost sniffing the air.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: I don’t like it. It was too easy... Look for ambient energy fields.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: All normal sir... The entire spectrum.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Check again.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Yes sir, I- Wait. My god. His radar lights up with dots. First a few, then HUNDREDS

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: They're everywhere. There are time knots opening everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: IMPACT NOW CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Suddenly an EXPLOSION rocks the ship. The crew goes SCUT one side of the ship then back in classic “the ship is ro fashion.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: A trap.

dialogues.speaker: LAZARUS
dialogues.text: We’re surrounded Captain. The entire 5k Ranking is out there.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Our plasma armor?

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Gone sir. Another BLAST rocks the room. (Close inspection reveals t ef the actors scuttle more than others.)

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Structural damage at 68 percent.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: We're getting major structural damage!

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: It's a core meltdown sir. It can’t be stopped! The Captain turns to his advisor, Lazarus.

dialogues.speaker: LAZARUS
dialogues.text: Captain, surrender may be our only option.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: No, never give up... NEVER surrender!

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: The reactor has eaten through four levels... Six levels... The ship is disintegrating!

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Your orders sir? Another SIREN sounds. The Captain pauses, considering the situation. His face a melodramatic collage of emotions.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Sir. Your orders? He walks into close up, steely determination on his face.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Activate the Omega 13. The crewmates exchange expectant and terrified glances. C of a crewman’s hand as he pushes down a CRYSTALLIN ROD wh turn opens five layers of mechanical locks revealing a se looking lever. The Captain pulls that lever. A MACHINE is revealed, rising from the floor in the midd room. It begins to GLOW. Cut to each actor in turn reacti dramatically. Then suddenly... THE PICTURE GOES WHITE, LEADER NUMBERS APPEAR, with a STU COPYRIGHT notice.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: HUNDREDS OF FACES - ENTHRALLED LEGIONS of mostly spotty f adolescent FANS staring into camera. For a moment all is A few are sobbing. Then a BURST OF THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE... at a SCIENCE FICTION CONVENTION. The enthusiastic crowd o nerds, and complete geeks continue cheering as the master ceremonies GUY takes the stage.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Well, there you are! You are the first people to see the lost GALAXY QUEST episode 53 two parter since it was originally aired in ‘82! (the fans cheer) As most of you know, no concluding episode was filmed when the series was cancelled, so the episode was never included in the syndication run. Let’s hear it for Travis Latke, who actually rescued the footage from the studio garbage. They were going to throw it out! Can you believe that? (Latke stands, fans cheer) Now for the moment you’ve all been waiting for... The intrepid crew of the USEA PROTECTOR! The audience cheers, but a STAGEHAND in the wings signals to “stretch.”

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: But first... What is a “hero”? Let’s take a look at a few more clips... The audience groans, impatient.

dialogues.speaker: BACKSTAGE
dialogues.text: Here we meet the REAL LIFE ACTORS all dressed as their TV egos... GWEN DEMARCO, beautiful, in a sexy and improbable suit. SIR ALEXANDER DANE, (DR. LAZARUS) irritable, wearin alien prosthetic makeup. DUSTY KWAN, calm, sitting on an off in a corner reading the paper. TOMMY WEBBER, the youn the group.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Where the hell is he?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: An hour and a half late. I can’t believe he’d do this to us again.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: I believe it, the bastard. He doesn't care about anybody but himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys hear he scheduled a fan appearance without us?

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: You’ re kidding. When for?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Tomorrow morning, before the store opening. My agent told me.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: But we made a pact. We said we'd stick together.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Right, like he’s got poyatty to anyone. This is the guy who tried to kill off Alex's character when it became too popular... Am I right, Alex? Alex?... They all turn to see Alexander staring into a makeup mirr roaming over his alien green makeup and scaly rubber feat a mournful expression.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Uh oh... Alex, get away from that thing...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: (staring into mirror) Dear god... How did I come to this?

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Didn’t we specifically say NO MIRRORS?...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I played Richard III at the Royal National Theater before her Majesty the Queen!..

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: (quietly, as he flips a page) “Five curtain calls...”

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: ...Five curtain calls! I was an ACTOR once, damn it. Now look at me. LOOK AT ME.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Settle down, Alex...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: No. I can’t go out there! I won't say that ridiculous catch phrase one more time. I won't. I can’t!

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: At least you had a PART. You had a character people loved! My TV guide interview was six paragraphs about this body suit. About my legs. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GWEN (cont'd) How did I perfect my trademark sidesaddle pose? ’ Nobody even bothered to ask what I DO on the ship. Nobody knows. Do you? Does anybody?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: You were the, uh... Wait I’1ll think of it...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I repeated the computer. Whatever it said, I turned and said to the rest of you. I spoke the obvious. Nothing I did ever affected the plot not ONCE. Nothing I did was ever taken SERIOUSLY.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Guys. I’m an African American playing a Malaysian named “Laredo.” HELLO! Suddenly the rear stage doors open, bright light streams JASON NESMITH ("The Captain”) appears, strolling in in hi confident exuberant charming way.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: My friends, your Captain has arrived! He pats Tommy on the back.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Am I too late for Alexanders’s panic attack? (looks at him) Apparently so. He squeezes Alexander’s shoulder, leans in to inspect a g green plastic mole on his neck.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: That's irregular, you should have it looked at. He flicks Dusty’s newspaper, reads over his shoulder. Dus out a hand for a mild five without looking up.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Lakers are HOT. (kisses Gwen on the cheek) Speaking of which... You look amazing. He locks up to see the others glaring at him. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Okay, what did I do now?

dialogues.speaker: CONVENTION STAGE
dialogues.text: On the stage, Guy continues to stall...

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: ..-Sure, the rocks looked like paper mache, and the sets moved when anyone bumped into them... But we didn’t care... FILM CLIPS are projected behind him: On an alien planet CAPTAIN carries the LIMP BODY OF HIS ADVISOR, LAZARUS, ra erupting around him... On the command deck the crew fight battle with crack precision TEAMWORK....

dialogues.speaker: GUY, (CONTINUED)
dialogues.text: ..-For those four seasons from ‘79 to ‘82 we the viewers developed the same affection for the crew of the USEA PROTECTOR that the crew had for each other... These weren't just adventurers exploring space, these were friends...

dialogues.speaker: BACKSTAGE
dialogues.text: The others surround JASON, fighting.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: You said we do appearances together, or not at all!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I didn’t say that. I said “wouldn’t it be great if we could always work together.” That’s what I said.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Unbelievable.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: You are so full of shit.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: What's the big deal? A few fans built a little set in their garage. I come in for an hour at most. It’s a nothing.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: How much of.a nothing? Not enough to split five ways kind of a nothing?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: What do you want me to say, Gwen?... They wanted the Captain. Suddenly bright light streams in. They all turn to see AL skulking out the exit. A beat, then they all run to catch Alexander, TACKLING HIM.

dialogues.speaker: ONSTAGE
dialogues.text: Guy gets a thumbs up cue from a stagehand and begins to i the cast, much to the delight of the applauding FANS. Guy Okay, here we go... Let’s hear a warm welcome for crack Navigator and Gunner “Lt. Laredo”, Tommy Webber!  . Tommy comes bounding out with a big smile, his hair musse screen behind is a projected film clip of Tommy in action

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY, (FILM CLIP)
dialogues.text: “If it’s got proton thrusters, I can fly it.”

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Ship's Tech Sergeant Chen... Dusty Kwan! Dusty strolls out with a casual wave.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY AS CHEN
dialogues.text: “I'll reverse the polarity. It’s our only hope.”

dialogues.speaker: BACKSTAGE
dialogues.text: Gwen and Jason are wrestling on the ground with Alexander

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Alex you can’t just leave.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I was knighted by the queen!!!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Come on, old friend...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Friend. You stole all my best lines. You cut me out of episode three entirely! One evil twin wasn’t enough, no you had to have TWO evil twins!..-

dialogues.speaker: GUY, (0.S. FROM THE STAGE)
dialogues.text: The beautiful shipmate Tawny Madison... GWEN

dialogues.speaker: DEMARCO
dialogues.text: Gwen hears her introduction and stands, leaving Jason to Alexander.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He’s all yours.

dialogues.speaker: ONSTAGE
dialogues.text: Gwen takes the stage. In the film clip, Tawny Madison loo around the cabin fearfully. SHIP’S COMPUTER One hundred degrees and rising...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN AS TAWNY MADISON
dialogues.text: “It's... It’s getting hotter, Captain!” Many “appreciative” WHISTLES. Gwen forces a smile.  Gcuy And now... The Captain’s advisor and closest friend. His peaceful nature ever at odds with the savage warrior inside him, after witnessing the massacre of his entire species as a boy... We see a split screen shot of Alexander, one peaceful and like, the other a savage reptilian beast, tearing into a

dialogues.speaker: BACKSTAGE
dialogues.text: Jason is still in a wrestling match with Alexander.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: You WILL go out there.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I won’t and nothing you say-

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: “The show must go on.”

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: (a beat) Damn you! Damn you! GUY (cont'd) (0.S.) “pr. Lazarus of Tev’meck”... Sir Alexander Dane! Alex bounds up on stage, bowing deep with grace and humil stage trained British actor.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX AS LAZARUS ONSCREEN
dialogues.text: “By Grabthar’s hammer, you shall be avenged!” Alex cringes, desperately unhappy.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: And finally, my fellow Questarians, the brave Captain of the USEA PROTECTOR... Peter Quincy Taggart ... JASON NESMITH. Jason appears and a SPOTLIGHT follows him on.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Unbelievable. He rented a SPOT? The Jason raises his hands like a conductor, encouraging the cry out in unison...

dialogues.speaker: JASON/ JASON ON SCREEN/ EVERYONE
dialogues.text: “NEVER GIVE UP, NEVER SURRENDER... DAMN THE NEUTRINO CANNONS... FULL SPEED AHEAD!” The fans go crazy. The actors exchange glances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain and his crew will be signing autographs on imperial decks “b” and “ce” near the coke machines.

dialogues.speaker: CONVENTION HALLWAY
dialogues.text: It's quiet. We're on FOUR PAIRS OF BOOTS walking down the hallway. We PAN UP to reveal FIVE SERIOUS LOOKING YOUNG P men and a woman, clean cut as Disneyland employees and im outfitted in GALAXY QUEST style uniforms. There’s somethi about their movements and be avior you can’t quite put yo on.. For now we'll refer to them as THE PECULIAR FANS. Th say a word to each other as they walk down the hallway an the bustling

dialogues.speaker: CONVENTION HALL
dialogues.text: We move with the PECULIAR FANS through the convention flo the numerous FANS dressed as their favorite GALAXY QUEST characters... through the various booths selling GALAXY Q other Sci-fi memorabilia, catching snippets of conversati the way: ...They pass two ELABORATELY COSTUMED ALIEN FANS talking.

dialogues.speaker: ALIEN
dialogues.text: ...Yeah, I used to be Gark’nor of Ang but I got a rash from the chest pads so now I’m Sacnod from episode 5, which is fine except the transducer pinches when I sit down... ...They pass a group of particularly EARNEST (geeky) FANS vendor’s booth, also costumed as the five GALAXY QUEST le Their leader, BRANDON WHEEGER, inspects a seller’s model DEFENDER, contemptuously.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: The tail fin is concave, not convex. The proton reactor is where the influx thermistors should be and.. my god... is this Testor’s blue green number six on the hull? (drops the model roughly) I... I... This is a complete abortion. With curious glances to this similarly uniformed group, t PECULIAR FANS move past, then come to a halt as they spot JASON, up on a raised platform at the front of the hall s autographs for a long line of fans. The peculiar fans stare at Jason as iff they were in the of God. They exchange astonished smiles and one of them e grows misty. Then they start toward him...

dialogues.speaker: THE CAST TABLE
dialogues.text: Gwen, Tommy, Alexander and Dusty sign autographs at a row tables near Jason, but significantly lower than his perch  10.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Is it me or does that sonofabitch’s table get higher every convention? One of many fans dressed as “Dr. Lazarus” steps up to Ale and salutes him with crossed fists.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: “By Grabthar’s hammer, by the suns of Warvan, I shall avenge you!” Alexander ignores this, grabs the photo from his hand, si thrusts it back. The next fan steps up.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: “By Grabthar’s hammer, by the-” He signs and thrusts it back before he can even finish.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Next! Guy (the MC) approaches the actors at their tables.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Hi everybody.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Hey. Thanks for the great intro, uh...

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Guy... You probably don’t remember me, do you? (they stare at him blankly) I was on the show in ‘79. Episode 12? Got killed by the lava monster before the first commercial? “Crewman #6?” The actors pretend that they remember him. “oh, right! Gu

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Listen, I was wondering, would you guys mind if I sit in today? See if anybody’s interested in an autograph? I mean, who knows...

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: Sure, Guy, if you can take the excitement. Two more FANS dressed as Alexander’s character approach h proudly CHATTERING at him in Lazarus’ “Mak’tar” language.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Don’t make me get a restraining order.

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE ROOM
dialogues.text: THE PECULIAR FANS are making their way through the crowd Jason. They have to step aside as a procession of fans pa through on their way to the costume contest. As the pecul stand there we suddenly notice something very strange;  ll. THE LEFT HAND of the tallest one is flickering like bad v on a TV, buzzing between a normal hand and A HAND WITH FO BLUE TENTACLES WHERE FINGERS SHOULD BE. The LEADER notices the flickering and motions to the affl man. The tall man raps sharply against a metal blinking b belt a few times -- like you might a broken radio -- and becomes normal again. He looks up, nods at the leader. Fr we'll just refer to these 5 as THE ALIENS.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE CAST TABLE
dialogues.text: Guy now sits with the others, forlorn. No fans are in lin autograph. He watches as Dusty fields questions from the dedicated fans led by the fastidious BRANDON.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Mr. Kwan? In episode nineteen, when the reactor fused, you used an element from Leopold Six to fix the thrusters. What was that called?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Bivrakium.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: The blue sheath it was encased in- ?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: A bi-thermal krevlite housing. Brandon makes a note, thanks him and exits with his group Guy How do you remember this stuff?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Oh I just make it up. Use lots of “k”s and “v"s. A male FAN moves up to Gwen, hands her a picture to «ign.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I’m a big fan Ms. Demarco. Gwen looks at the photo, nonplussed.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You really expect me to sign a naked picture of myself? This isn’t even my body!

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Yeah, normally with fakes it’s like, recycle bin. But.. This one’s really good. (Gwen sighs, starts to sign) Could you not write over the... Thanks. A fan finally approaches Guy who looks up eagerly. The fa at him quizzically, trying to place him.  — ———— 12.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Episode 12. (gets no reaction) Killed by the lava monster?..

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (turns to Tommy) Mr. Webber, could I get an autograph? Guy shrugs, disappointed. Gwen gives him a comforting loo looks across at

dialogues.speaker: JASON ON HIS PERCH
dialogues.text: Talking dramatically to a group of fans.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: ...on one hand, if I had moved an inch, the beast would have killed me. On the other hand, my crew was in danger...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: How did you know what to do?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Without a crew, I’m not a Captain. (he smiles) And we all know what happened to that beast on Enok 7... The fans make happy nerdy “we sure do” noises.

dialogues.speaker: CASTMEMBERS TABLE
dialogues.text: Gwen shakes her head appreciatively.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You gotta admit, they do love him.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY 7
dialogues.text: Almost as much as he loves himself. They watch as Jason fields another question from a fan.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: ...I'm glad you asked... To me the most important qualities of a Galaxy Explorer are loyalty...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: ...to camera center no matter whose shot you're blocking...

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Leadership....

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: ...to make sure craft service keeps those little butter cookies, and plenty of them...  13.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: And determination.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: -..to playing scenes shirtless because the ladies do love Captain Furry. Gwen, Alex and the others try to contain their laughter a CLOSER ANGLE - JASON’S TABLE Bored with the constant queries of his fans, Jason glance see Gwen smiling at him. He smiles back, unaware that her is at his expense. She quickly looks away, self-conscious doesn’t even take his eyes off Gwen as BRANDON steps forw brow knit with serious matters.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Captain, please settle a dispute that my crew and I are having. In “The Quasar Dilemma”, the Sentient had taken control of the ship’s guidance systems, however- Jason stands, his attention still on Gwen.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Excuse me guys. Jason exits. Brandon turns to his friends, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: I hadn’t even gotten to the relevant conundrum...

dialogues.speaker: THE CAST TABLE
dialogues.text: Gwen answers a question from a shy NERD GIRL.

dialogues.speaker: NERD GIRL
dialogues.text: Miss Demarco?... In episode 15, “Caverns of Delos 5?” I got the feeling you and the Captain kind of... had a thing... in the cave when you were sealed off together... Did you?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: The Captain and I NEVER had a thing. Jason sidles up.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: That’s her story. The nerd girl giggles and exits, leaving Jason and Gwen a

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: So decent of you to come mingle with the little people.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Okay, what’s up Gwen? I know you. It's not my little fan appearance tomorrow that’s got you so pissed off. What is it?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Where were you on Tuesday?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Tuesday, Tuesday... Oh, Jake's birthday, right... Is that all you’re mad about?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Is that all? He did your makeup every day, put up with all your crap, never complained once and you couldn’t take one stupid hour out of your night to toast him at his birthday?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I meant to but I got busy. Hey, you know if Jake ever really needed anything I'd be there for him. I admit, I’m not great with the small stuff, but with the big stuff...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He died yesterday. Cardiac arrest. This shuts Jason up. He looks a bit stunned.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Shit. Old Jake? I was... I was going to-

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: But you didn’t. (beat) You have this image of yourself, Jason. Maybe it’s the show. Maybe it's the way you saw yourself as a kid. Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re not that guy. You're not the guy you think you are.

dialogues.speaker: I... I...
dialogues.text: Jason looks stunned. He starts to say something, but seem genuinely affected. He turns and walks away. Gwen feels b

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Shit...

dialogues.speaker: CONVENTION FLOOR
dialogues.text: Jason moves forward, introspective, amidst the enthusiast They all shout out questions and comments to him... But J pushes past without response and takes refuge in the- MEN’S ROOM Jason enters to witness the incongruous sight of four MAN beasts at the urinals taking a MANK’NAR piss.  1s. He enters a stall and sits on the lid, trying to get a md think. But two CYNICAL 20-SOMETHINGS enter, laughing thei off.

dialogues.speaker: CYNICAL GUY 1
dialogues.text: You're right. What a FREAK SHOW. This is fricking HILARIOUS.

dialogues.speaker: CYNICAL GUY 2
dialogues.text: Yeah, what a bunch of losers. And those poor actors. They’ve done, like, WHAT for twenty years? I think Dusty Kwan did a dog food commercial... Sad.

dialogues.speaker: CYNICAL GUY 1
dialogues.text: Did you hear Nesmith up there? That’s the saddest. I think he actually gets off on these nerds thinking he’s space captain. It’s pathetic. And his friends...

dialogues.speaker: CYNICAL GUY 2
dialogues.text: ...they HATE him. I know, did you hear them ragging on him? “Loyalty...to center stage.”

dialogues.speaker: CYNICAL GUY 1
dialogues.text: He has no idea that he’s a laughingstock... Even to his buddies. They exit, their laughter ringing in Jason’s ears. CONVENTION FLOOR - JASON’S TABLE Jason is back at his table signing autographs in a foul m scribbles his name irritably, avoiding contact with the f BRANDON and his group of nerds approach hin.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Captain, as I was saying... In “The Quasar Dilemma”, the Sentient had taken control of your ship’s systems, and you used the auxiliary of deck b to gain control. But the CD ROMS of the ship guidance systems indicate that the auxiliary of deck b is not tied to the main power grid, so we were wondering then where the error lies.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: {he stares at them a beat) What’s wrong with you?

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Excuse me?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: It’s a television show. Okay? That’s all. It’s just a bunch of fake sets, and wooden props, do you understand?

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Yes but, we were wondering-  16.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: There IS no quantum flux and there is no auxiliary... There’s no goddamn ship! Do you get it? Do YOU? Gwen and the others notice the commotion at the other tab exchange glances. Jason is now standing.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: ...Throwing away your time and energy on a TV show that’s been off the air for twenty years! What the hell is wrong with you? Jason notices that all eyes are turned on him. The hall h deathly quiet. Angry and ashamed, he rises and exits thro hall. Brandon and the fans do their best not to take this personally. Tommy turns to Alex, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Wow. What was that?

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I’ve said for years. He’s mentally deranged.

dialogues.speaker: CONVENTION HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Jason strides down the hallway. As he turns the corner he into the five ALIENS. Their leader, BETZALAR, pauses, bow head respectfully before addressing Jason.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Captain, I must speak to you. I am Betzalar of the Theramin Nebula. We have come on a matter of supreme importance...

dialogues.speaker: NOT. NOW.
dialogues.text: He pushes past them and continues away down the hallway. INT. JASON’S BEDROOM Jason sits on the edge of the bed. Gulps down the last of of scotch. He flips channels. We pan to THE TELEVISION as the channels change; late night fare.. numbers... infomercial for a Flowbee.... He stops at the conclusion of an episode of GALAXY QUEST... Captain Tagga a heroic speech. Jason begins to mouth the words along wi alterego.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN TAGGART, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: As long as there is injustice, whenever a Targathian baby cries out, wherever a distress signal sounds among the stars... We'll be there. This fine ship, and this fine crew...  17. ’ We pan back to the bed... Jason has passed out, body twis down in a pillow. FADE OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason sleeps, hungover, dead to the world. His DOORBELL RINGS. He barely moves. Every indication is dead. More ringing. He stirs enough to groan, and drags a ever his head. The ringing continues....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason opens the door in his robe, drooping bloodshot eyes of a headache... There before him are

dialogues.speaker: THE ALIENS
dialogues.text: dressed in their perfect GALAXY QUEST attire. Jason stare them, bleary eyed. With earnest respectful faces, the fiv him inthe classic “GALAXY QUEST” style. Jason shuts the d their face. CUT TO BLACK... DING DONG! The door opens again.

dialogues.speaker: WHAT. DO. YOU. WANT
dialogues.text: The leader, BETZALAR, steps forward. Speaks quickly. BETZALAR . Sir, I understand this is a terrible breach of protocol- But please, we've come on a long journey at great risk, and I beg you to hear our plea. We are Thermians from the Klatu Nebula. Our people are being systematically hunted and slaughtered by Roth’h’ar Sarris of Fatu-Krey. Out of self preservation we have constructed a duplicate of your ship, The Protector, from your historical records, your computer databases... Sarris, our nemesis, wants the ship, he is particularly interested in the Omega 13. We are to meet in a negotiation. However our past efforts in this regard have been nothing short of disastrous. The flames, the death... (he quickly gathers himself) You are our last hope. Your leadership, your courage, your skills at negotiation and diplomacy are our only bid for survival. Jason scans his brain, then two synapses connect.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Oh, right! The thing with the thing. My agent told me. Sorry. Come on in, I’1ll get some pants on.  18. INT. JASON’S HOUSE The four aliens stand on one side of the room. Jason, mos dressed, hunts under his couch for something.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Captain, sir. I speak for all of us when I say that standing here in your presence is the greatest honor we could ever have hoped to achieve in our lifetimes. Mostly all they can see of Jason at the moment is his but

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Thanks, appreciate it... Anybody seen my other shoe? The others look around the room for the shoe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason enters and sits in the back with the aliens. Betzal motions the driver to go.

dialogues.speaker: NERO
dialogues.text: Sir, I am Neru, senior requisition officer. Before we travel to the ship, please let me know if you have any requirements. Weapons, documents, personnel...

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: {half awake) I could use a Coke. One of the aliens nods to the other who makes a note.

dialogues.speaker: TEB
dialogues.text: Sir, I am Teb. I would like to explain the historical situation between our people and the - Sarris Dominion in greater detail. In the 5 million years following the great nebula burst our people were one...

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: How about him? Doesn’t he talk?

dialogues.speaker: TEB
dialogues.text: His translator is broken. The fourth alien says something, but it comes out a weird sounds. Like a screaming baby inside a bagpipe.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Okey doke... So, listen, I had a late night with a Kreemorian Fangor Beast, so I’m going to shut my eyes for a bit. But keep going, I’m still listening... Jason is asleep before Teb gets the next sentence out.  19.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason is shaken softly by the shoulders. He opens his eye a young female CREWMAN in GALAXY QUEST uniform, LALIARI.

dialogues.speaker: LALIARI
dialogues.text: I am sorry to wake you, siz, but your presence is requested on the command deck. Jason tries to reorient himself as she leads him forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laliari escorts Jason down the high tech hallway. Jason l around, still holding his can of Coke.

dialogues.speaker: LALIARI
dialogues.text: Sir, Sarris has moved the deadline. We are approaching his ship at the Ni-delta now. He wants an answer to his proposal. I understand you have been briefed.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Yeah, I got most of it in the car. He’s the bad guy, right?

dialogues.speaker: LALIARI
dialogues.text: Yes sir he is a very bad man indeed. He has tortured our scientists, put us to work in the gallium arsenide mines, captured our females for his own demented purposes... JASON . Okay I’ve got the picture. Let’s see what old Sarris has to say for himself. Betzalar approaches with other CREWMEMBERS.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR -
dialogues.text: Captain... Welcome to the Protector II. Would you like to don your uniform?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Mind if we skip that? I have to get back pretty quick for this thing in Van Nuys.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: As you wish. Another ALIEN comes running up out of breath.

dialogues.speaker: EXCITED ALIEN
dialogues.text: Sir... It’s Sarris. He's here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A door slides OPEN and Jason and the others enter the COM DECK.... It’s straight out of the TV show.  20. Blinking lights, consoles, the cool old tech displays... looks around, genuinely impressed.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Not bad. I was expecting some cardboard boxes in a garage. They lead him to the Captain’s chair. He sits.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I mean, I’ve never even seen the real one all put together like this. They’d shoot the master this way, then they’d pull the back walls for the reverse angles and... This thing have a cup holder?

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: We're approaching in five ticks, sir. Command to slow? Jason looks toward the front window/view screen. Stars mo in a familiar display.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Sure, set the screen saver on two. The NAVIGATOR looks at him, confused.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Sorry. Sorry. Didn’t mean to break the mood. Slow to Mark 2, lieutenant. A SHIP appears on the screen, growing closer. It is a MEN craft, sharp and jagged, with a gargoyle shaped figurehea ship slows to a stop, looking like the Cathedral of Notre Then the VIEWSCREEN fuzzes to life with an image of...

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS
dialogues.text: He’s ugly and green hued. Black sharp teeth. A metal hand hisses... There is a beat as the aliens take in the sight to well their courage.

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS
dialogues.text: I see fear. That is expected. The whole room resonates with his voice.

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS
dialogues.text: Ah, they bring a new Captain... Such a cowardly race. Not even your own kind... No matter. Here are my demands, and I would suggest, Captain, that you think well before speaking a word, because these negotiations are... tender... and if I do not like what I hear... There will be blood and pain as you cannot imagine... Jason takes a sip of coke and checks his watch.  21.

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS
dialogues.text: First, I require the Omega 13... Second-

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: (blase, like a laundry list) Okey dokey, let's fire blue disrupters full. Fire red disrupters full. Fire gannet magnets left and right. Fire pulse catapults from all chutes. And throw this thing at him too, killer. He hands the GUNNER the empty coke can, then before even -.-he exits!

dialogues.speaker: HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Jason emerges and looks both ways trying to get his beari Several of the aliens chase after him as he enters the co exchanging stunned glances, trying to absorb the magnitud just happened.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Captain?... Where are you... going?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Home.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: You... You mean Earth?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Yeah. “Earth.” Time to get back to “Earth,” kids. He turns a corner. Jason is oblivious to the very soft mu sounds of explosions, traces of the demolition going on o

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: But Captain... The negotiation... You... You... You fired on him!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Right. Long live... What’s your planet?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Theramin.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Long live Theramin! Take a left here?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: What if Sarris survives?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Oh, I don’t think. so. I gave him both barrels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has a very powerful ship. Perhaps you would like to... Wait to see the results of...

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I would but I am REALLY running late and the 134’s a parking lot after 2:00. But listen, the guy gives you any more trouble, just give a ca. see Betzalar produces a walkie talkie device for Jason.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: An interstellar vox.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Thanks. Betzalar looks him in the eye. A TEAR starts down his che HUGS Jason, then shakes his hand sincerely.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: How can we thank you, Captain. You- You have saved our people.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: It was a lot of fun. You kids are great. The others shake his hand, thanking him as they enter the

dialogues.speaker: DOCKING BAY
dialogues.text: A room with a very high circular ceiling. In the middle o room are a number of red lighted disks about the size of covers. The aliens thank Jason, leading him onto the disk they depart, everybody waving their good-byes. Jason realizes he’s left all alone in this strange room w visible doors.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Wait. Where’s the car? Suddenly a CLEAR CYLINDER rises from the circumference of and deforms around him, ENCASING HIM IN A BULLET SHAPED C It’s as if he’s sealed in a lucite paperweight. There is instant to register surprise as... The ceiling divides, opening like an iris. The ROAR of es oxygen, and an AWE INDUCING ROTATING STARFIELD is reveale expanding circle... The WALLS pull back around him. And J suddenly finds himself surrounded by THE INFINITE VASTNESS OF SPACE. And before he can fully register the HORROR of his situat Jason in his pod is ROCKETED FORWARD INTO SPACE.  23.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He HURTLES FORWARD, the acceleration impossible, faster a faster... It's the entire 30 minute ending of 2001 in 10 Overwhelming. A rollercoaster at light speed. The univers and snaps like a rubber band. Planets scatter in front of bowling pins and he quickly finds himself heading toward an undulating BLACK HOLE... Toward the mass so dense it e absorbs light and time... And on impact the screen is fil

dialogues.speaker: BLACK
dialogues.text: We pull back slowly from the iris of Jason's eye. He is n standing on the black disk in the middle of his own back stands there in shock, SHIVERING IN WAVES AND WAVES from incomprehension of what he’s just experienced, unable to the spot.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BRANDON’S GARAGE - TARZANA - DUSK Crickets chirp. Inside the open garage of a suburban hous BRANDON and his friends in their uniforms, surrounded by homemade space ship interior constructed of painted cardb boxes and Christmas lights. Brandon and his friends look disappointed... The Captain never showed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gwen, Alexander, Tommy, Dusty and Guy are in their GALAXY uniforms, performing a lame routine for the computer stor opening. A small crowd is gathered, including Brandon and gang, inspecting a mock up of the PROTECTOR.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Take it from us... We’ve been all over the universe...

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: But we've never seen the space age values we've seen here at...

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: TechCo electronics superstore! Alexander pauses, deeply ashamed. Gwen nudges him.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: (mumbles) By Grabthar‘s hammer, what a savings. A few balloons are released into the air.  24.

dialogues.speaker: STORE ENTRANCE
dialogues.text: The actors hand out pamphlets and sign the occasional aut Dusty pats Alexander's back, who stares ahead, morose. Th up to see JASON approaching. His demeanor a good deal mor and less cavalier than usual.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Do you know what time it is? Why did you even pother to show up? Jason opens his mouth, but he’s got so much to say he can out a word. Gwen notices his wrinkled slept-in clothing, eyes.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Jason... Are you all right? Jason moves his lips a little more, then, unable to expre himself otherwise, POINTS to the sky, grasping for words.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Iwas there. (a beat) Up. There. The acters exchange glances as Jason sits and leans in conspiratorially. His voice is quiet but intense.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: They came to the convention. I thought they were fans, but they're not. They’re from...

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Up there? Jason nods vigorously.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: They took me up to their ship. What they puilt... It’s incredible! I fought this man, this... THING... called Sarris. I kicked his ASS... They have these... pods. One took me THROUGH a black hole. The pod generator is SITTING in my back yard!... He smiles crazily. He senses their disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I know. I know what you're thinking. I'd think so too. But I can prove it. Look! He searches his pockets frantically and produces the inte vox. The thing blinks its little red light. He motions vi

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: See? Huh! The others exchange glances, then produce their own inter voxes, placing them on the table. They blink just like hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Yes, but have you been talking to people in outer space all morning on them? I have! Gwen turns to Alexander.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I don’t know. My therapist only does light neurosis.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: I have a good Freudian I see sometimes... As the others chime in with suggestions Jason picks up hi pushes a button. A VOICE EMITS FROM THE VOX.

dialogues.speaker: VOX VOICE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Yes Captain. Your orders?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Stand by. The others stare at the vox, silenced. Re has their atten

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I’m going pack up. I didn’t kill Sarris. He's still alive. And upset I’m told. I want you ali to come with me. It’s the opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to explore the infinite... We’ll save an entire civilization. You’1] meet them, they’re very nice... Gwen looks at Jason. Be looks so sincere-

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Gwen, you know me. I’m a lot of things, but I’m not crazy. I need you to believe me. Gwen looks at his pleading expression. A beat. Then she p the vox and hits the switch.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Hi! Anybody up there?

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Where is the Captain?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He’s here. This is Gwen- uh, Lt. Tawny Madison.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Yes! Yes Lieutenant Madison, Ma‘ am! Gwen raises an eyebrow, flattered by the enthusiasm.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You’ re on the ship? Right now? You have weapons and everythisg?  26.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Then could you just, if it’s not a problem, blow something up? Not a planet or anything. Just maybe a moon or asteroid? Something small so we can see where you are.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: {a long beat) Uh... Captain? Captain are you- Jason, smiling at Gwen’s smarts, takes the vox.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: This is the Captain. Go ahead. Do it.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Yes sir. Right away sir.. Targeting the largest asteroid in the Andromeda chain. Detonation in Five seconds. Three.. two... The others look at the sky, starting to get sucked in.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Andromeda Nine has been obliterated. They all look around. Nothing seems to have happened. The feel silly even for a moment believing something might ha

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: ..-Right. Okay, thanks. (switches off the vox) They're very far away.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Jason... You need help.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: No, I don’t. But they do. I know how this is going to sound, but I don’t care; Going up there changed me. I know deep down that for once in my life, I can do something really good and really meaningful - We all can do something... amazing! (he stands) Look, I realize I can’t convince you with words. Just come to my house at eight. You’1l see the transport pod. It looks like a manhole cover, but wait ‘till you see what happens... Then you can do whatever you want, okay? He starts away. Jason...  27.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Eight o’clock. Just trust me. Please trust me, just this once. The others exchange distrustful glances.

dialogues.speaker: PARKING LOT
dialogues.text: Jason pulls his car keys out of his pocket as he turns a and runs smack into the group of NERDS led by Brandon. Br Jason go down, along with an armful of GALAXY QUEST colle

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Sorry...

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: (at attention) Captain!... My apologies. Brandon is nudged by his friend KYLE.

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: Captain... Evidently we had some miscommunication regarding yesterday’s scheduled voyage, and-

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Sorry I'm in a real hurry. He gathers his things and quickly walks to his car. The o nerds look at Brandon.

dialogues.speaker: KYLE
dialogues.text: He dissed us AGAIN, Brandon!

dialogues.speaker: BRANDON
dialogues.text: (hiding his disappointment) He probably... Has some very important business to attend to... The others want to believe that too.

dialogues.speaker: OTHERS
dialogues.text: Yeah... I guess so... They shuffle off, despondent. JASON’S CAR Jason drives. He reaches into his pocket for his Vox, and the “talk” switch.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Hello? (no response) Protector? Betzalar? Anybody there?  28.

He taps the vox, then notices a tag on the bottom that re “PROPERTY OF BRANDON WHEEGER.” He thinks about driving ba checks his watch, then shrugs and drives on. INT. JASON’S BEDROOM - NIGHT Jason’s GALAXY QUEST uniform hangs neatly on a hanger. Ja looks at it for a moment, then pulls it out of his closet series of SHOTS Jason buttons the shirt, fastens the belt on the boots, attaches the Captain’s stripes... He looks at himself in the mirror for the moment. Picks a lint from his shirt. He turns and looks at the clock. It' His friends haven't shown. A tinge of disappointment in h He moves to the sliding glass doors and looks out to his backyard... The glowing TRANSPORT POD DISK still sits in the middle o lawn. Jason’s eyes GLISTEN. He opens the door and moves F INT. GWEN'S HOUSE/ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Gwen paces in her kitchen, cooking dinner. She’s on the p ALEXANDER. (INTERCUT WITH ALEXANDER at his apartment. He’ in makeup, eating a sandwich.)

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: God, I don’t know, Alex. I should have gone over. He practically begged. I feel lousy.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Don’t. He’s not crazy. It’s just a desperate bid for attention.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Did you see the look in his eyes? He looked, I don’t know... Like he was a kid again.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER -
dialogues.text: That’s what he is, a big kid. Let me tell you something, Gwen, he needs to grow up.... And I’ll tell you something else... _..AS Alexander continues to rant on about Jason, Gwen’s is drawn to the TELEVISION.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE TV
dialogues.text: A STARFIELD IMAGE... The TV SCIENCE REPORTER circles a br colored area of light on the image. A NASA ANIMATION show asteroid exploding and disappearing.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENCE REPORTER
dialogues.text: ...scientists are at a loss to explain this explosion in space but as these Hubble photographs show, it was spectacular...  : 29.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: (intense) Channel four.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Turn_on Channel four.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: .--The asteroid, largest in a chain called Andromeda Nine, was completely vaporized in an explosion so bright it could even be viewed by the naked eye this evening, yet distant enough that it took an estimated four hours for the light from the phenomenon to reach the earth... Gwen watches, jaw dropped to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: There's a logical explanation.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: It’s true... It happened, it really... Wait, that was me! I blew up an asteroid, Alex!

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Now Gwen, get ahold of yourself... This sort of thing happens every day... Supernovas, planetary anomalies...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He said the NAME. Andromeda Nine! How many Andromeda Nines get blown up every- Then suddenly something that looks like a METEOR plunges the sky and lands in Gwen’s back yard. It happened so fas she barely registered it. But sitting on her patio is a g DISK, like the one at Jason’s house.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Gwen?... Gwen?... Hypnotized, Gwen walks toward the door and goes into her.

dialogues.speaker: BACKYARD
dialogues.text: She moves toward the POD GENERATOR. It GLOWS more brightl approaches. ALEXANDER (cont’d) Three’s a logical explanation, Gwen... ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT Alexander sees an identical streak in the sky, and a glow DISK appears right on his BALCONY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?-

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You have one too. You do, don’t you?

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: I... I... What is it? Where did it come from?..

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He sent them down for us... What did he call it? A pod transport?...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Oh Gwen, you can’t be serious. Now- Unable to resist, she takes a step forward onto the disk. A BLINDING FLASH OF LIGHT. HER PHONE falls to the ground. ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT Alexander stands next to the pod on his balcony...

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Gwen? GWEN? Oh, I see. Just like the old days. You and Jason pulling pranks on the humorless Brit. Alexander looks at the GLOWING, BECKONING disk... ALEXANDER (cont’d) I suppose you have your camcorder hidden somewhere. Fine, where is it? I‘ll play it to camera... He takes a step toward the disk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY and GUY walk up to the front door calling for Alex.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Alex? Are you here? We were over at Marlo’s and on TV we saw... Alex, where are you? They open the door just as... IN THE BACKGROUND ON THE BA ALEXANDER STEPS ONTO THE DISK and in a flash, the transpa forms around him sealing him in and EXPLODES AWAY at ligh Tommy and Guy close the door, completely unaware.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Alex? You here? Alex?..

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: What the hell is THAT thing? The POD GENERATOR glows on the patio...  INT. DUSTY’S APARTMENT Pan up from BARE LEGS dripping WATER on the carpet to Dus in a bathrobe straight from the shower. He gazes curiousl GLOWING DISK sitting in the middle of his living room.... then looks up to see layers of perfectly round holes burn through five levels of his apartment building through to sky... He scratches his chin, thoughtfully, in his calm unflappable way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PAN from a blinking panel in a grey room of the spaces The room LIGHTS BRILLIANTLY with a flash. Then ANOTHER FL continue PANNING to find...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, ALEXANDER AND GUY STANDING ON THE SHIP'S POD PLATFO
dialogues.text: arrived from their horrifying journey from Earth. They st paralyzed, shivering, white as ghosts. Suddenly a streak of light appears through a hatch in the and a POD arrives right next to them, opening up to revea He stands, horrified and teeth chattering like the rest. like a bunch of horrified bowling pins all facing toward.

dialogues.speaker: A METAL HATCH
dialogues.text: Beyond it they register the SOUND of WET FOOTSTEPS growin closer... Their eyes widen as they see the far door open a group of S HORRIBLE TENTACLED ALIEN MONSTERS! The monst toward them, the sound from their drooling mouths a horri SCREAMING CACOPHONY. They surround our terrified visitors tinkering with devices around them, their tentacles flyin everywhere. Then one of the monsters looks down at a mech his belt and turns to the other monsters sheepishly.

dialogues.speaker: MONSTER
dialogues.text: Oops. Crewmen, your skins! Activate your E- skins! The monsters all flip switches on their belts their forms HUMAN, uniformed as ship's TECHNICIANS.

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Our most sincere apologies! We forgot about our appearance generators. Then JASON appears in the doorway, a big warm smile on hi

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Guys! You CAME!... They stand there, still paralyzed and terrified.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Okay, who wants the grand tour? Guy is now relaxed enough to let out the loudest most ge SCREAM you’ve ever heard in your life. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Okay, Guy... Anybody else? Then another streak of light, and Dusty appears alongside others in his bathrobe. As his pod retracts into the floo steps off of the disk, unaffected, and walks past the oth

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Now that was a hell of a thing. (to Jason, motioning to others) What's wrong with them? Jason smiles. Nothing gets to Dusty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason leads Gwen, Alexander, Tommy, Guy and Dusty down th They shuffle forward like recent hospital releasees, look around silent and dumbfounded at their surroundings (ever Dusty, who takes everything in stride.) They shake their little as they walk.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: That's right... Just keep shaking it out... Weird feeling going through that black hole, isn’t it? Like somebody turned you inside out set the blender on puree and poured you into a wall socket, am I right?

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Wh... Where are we?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Twenty third quadrant of gamma sector. Don’t ask me. I can show you on a map. Then BETZALAR appears coming down the hall with a small g ALIENS. He has a warm smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Welcome my friends! I am Betzalar. On behalf of my people I wish to thank you from the deepest place in our hearts. Re reaches out to shake their hands, one at a time, with deep respect.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Dr. Lazarus... Lt. Madison. Tech Sgt. Chen... Lt. Laredo... He looks at Guy quizzically, not sure who he is. Guy “Crewman #6”... Call me Guy.  33.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You... know us?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: (soft laugh) I don’t believe there is a man, woman or child on my planet who does not. In the years since we first received your ship’s historical documents, we have studied, discussed and debated every facet of your missions, technologies and strategies.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Historical documents?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Yes. Eighteen years ago we received transmission of the first. It continued for four years, and then stopped, as mysteriously as it came...

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: You've been watching the sho- (he’s nudged by Jason) the historical records... out HERE?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Yes, I am ashamed to say, but in the last hundred years our society had fallen into disarray. Our goals, our values had become scattered. But since the transmission we have modeled many aspects of our society from your example, and it has saved us. Your courage, teamwork, optimism and resourcefulness. In fact, all you see around you now, comes from the lessons laid out in the historical documents.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: THAT'S why you built this ship?

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: It’s... incredible.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Oh this? No, this isn’t the ship. This is only the star port for the ship. - {a twinkle in his eye) You want to see the ship? He leads them to a large square window, blocked by an opa shield, and pushes a button. Slowly with a RUMBLE the shi slides aside way revealing...

dialogues.speaker: PROTECTOR DOCKED IN FRONT OF THEM...
dialogues.text: They all gawk at the amazing sight, their eyes wide like  34.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: It’s real. Oh my god, it’s real.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: All this from watching the.. historical records?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Yes, and from your supplementary technical documents, of course... He motions to another alien who withdraws a number of bri colored BOOKS and BOXES from a backpack, and passes them The actors look through the materials... They are various BOOKS and ENTERTAINMENT SOFTWARE bearing such titles as “ OFFICIAL GALAXY QUEST BLUEPRINTS: USEA PROTECTOR” and “VI GALAXY QUEST: THE CDROM EXPERIENCE.” The actors exchange and then... ..-Tommy begins to giggle. Alex looks at him, at the fan stuff, then out at the ENOR SHIP, and he begins to laugh too... The others join in... Guy... Laughing like maniacs, hysterical, disbelieving la the GIANT SHIP hanging outside in infinite space in the background. The aliens join in too, out of joyfulness, an stands there smiling, a proud papa, as the laughter ECHOE the cosmos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CLEAR TRANSPORT tube runs from the docking structure to ship. Inside everyone can get a good look at the space pa as they approach the ship. The view is breathtaking. Guy So you people don’t actually... Look the way you look... Right?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: No. This device on our belts simulates an appearance more familiar to you, as well as translating our language to yours. We have found from earlier visits to Earth, that our true appearance can be... distracting. The actors wave this off... “No, you look great... Fabulo One of the aliens, NEX, motions out the window to Tommy.

dialogues.speaker: NEX
dialogues.text: Lt. Laredo. It may interest you to see that we have mounted an additional Proton Afterburner over the aft proton vent. We felt it improved navigational stability. We hope it doesn’t offend.  35.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Well, I’1l have to try it out before I can comment.

dialogues.speaker: NEX
dialogues.text: We look forward to it. Your skills are legendary. The others turn to stare at Tommy. He just shrugs as the comes to a stop, locking at the ship’s hatch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group walks down the corridor, peeking into various r more amazed every second.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: That’s the medical quarters to the left... Weapons storage... Maintenance facility... As they pass each room, the CREWMEMBERS inside salute.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: The main barracks... TWO HUNDRED crewmen rise to attention. Jason salutes back

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: At ease men.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: (looks at Jason, shakes her head) Like throwing gasoline on a fire...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group enters. The centerpiece to the room is a large pulsating ORB. When the orb dims, we see its surface has texture, like a large boulder. Many CREWMEN scurry about to the surrounding measurement devices.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: The generator room.... Our Carbonite Sphere, of course... I hope, Tech Sergeant Chen, that this meets with your approval.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Fine... Very nice and... tidy. Three YOUNGER CREWMEN approach and whisper to Betzalar. T a bit, then Betzalar reticently approaches Dusty.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: I am sorry to ask this of you so shortly after your arrival. But members of our reactor staff have a question they find most pressing.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Well certainly... What is it, son?  36.

dialogues.speaker: TECH
dialogues.text: Sir, we have had unexplained proton surges in our delta core. They cannot be verified on the sub frequency spectrum, but they appear on the valence detector when scanning the Carbonite Sphere. We are unable to resolve this problem and were hoping you would be able to advise us. Everyone turns to Dusty who takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Uh huh... I see... Well, that’s a puzzler isn’t it?... A textbook puzzler... The others watch, wondering what he’ll say. Then Dusty tu one of the Techs with an air of authority.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: ++. You.

dialogues.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
dialogues.text: Yes sir?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: (testy) I haven’t got all day. What might account for this phenomenon?

dialogues.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
dialogues.text: Perhaps... The valence bonds have shifted?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Yes... And therefore?...

dialogues.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
dialogues.text: Therefore the bonding molecules have become covalent?

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY 7
dialogues.text: And if this were the case, how would you remedy it?...

dialogues.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
dialogues.text: (smiling, figuring it out) Introduce a bonding substrate! A two molecule compound sharing a free electron apiece and bombard the ions with their reflective isotopes! Dusty smiles, giving him a wink.

dialogues.speaker: DUSTY
dialogues.text: Now you’ve got it. The other TECHS grin, astonished.

dialogues.speaker: TECH
dialogues.text: Of course! It’s so obvious!

dialogues.speaker: TECH
dialogues.text: Sergeant Chen, you're... amazing! Dusty waves off the praise modestly. Betzalar shoots a lo as if to say “we're in good hands here.”

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Now I suggest that you go to your cabins and rest before we take the ship out of dock. He claps his hands and a group of aliens arrive to meet t

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: These crewmen will escort you to quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex's young escort, QUELLEK, leads him down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: Dr. Lazarus... I hope that I’m not breaching protocol but.. I am so very humbled to stand in your presence... I have studied your missions extensively... Though I am Thermian, I have lived my life by your philosophy, by the code of the Mak’tar.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Well good, that’s very... nice.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: (emotional) By Grabthar’s Hammer, Dr. Lazarus, I-

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Don’t do that. I’m not kidding.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: (bewildered) - I‘m sorry, sir, I was only-

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Just don’t.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: +-..Yes sir. (they come to a stop) Your quarters sir. INT. ALEX’S QUARTERS Quellek opens the door and they enter. The room is a grey completely barren.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: This is it?  38.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: Yes sir. Marvelous, isn’t it? Completely distractionless.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Where's my bed? Quellek pushes a button and FIVE LARGE SPIKES rise from t

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: Just as on your home planet, sir. If I may say, it took me three years to master the spikes, but now I sleep with a peace I never thought possible... Alexander points to a door.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Is that the bathroom?

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: Yes sir... (Alex moves to the door) The use of your waste facilities were strangely absent from the historical records, so we had to extrapolate purely on the basis of your anatomy. INT. ALEX’S BATHROOM They enter. Alex looks down at a thing that looks more li torture device than a toilet, with elaborate tubes and st and plugs going everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: QUELLEK
dialogues.text: You're quite complicated, sir. Alex stares at the thing, despairingly. INT. TOMMY’S QUARTERS Tommy’s escort SED hands over various weapons to grinning

dialogues.speaker: SED
dialogues.text: Here is your ion shield. Your vox. Your molecular disrupter... We know you prefer a sensitive trigger. If there is anything else you require?

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Uh, no, I’m good. Thanks. (Sed starts to exit) Oh wait. Here you go. Tommy stuffs a couple of bucks into Sed’s hand. Sed looks tip, perplexed, and exits.  39. INT. GWEN’S CABIN An exotic and beautiful room. Gwen is changing into her G QUEST uniform. There’s a knock on the door.

dialogues.speaker: JASON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It's Jason...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: One minute, I’m - (he enters) Hey, I’m dressing!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Oh come on, it’s not like I haven’t- She glares. He turns his back while she finishes dressing

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Okay. She turns. They just look at each other for a moment. Gwe out into a smile, trying to find the words.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: , I just can’t believe it. Any of it! Look at on this room!.. They designed it based on the Tauran Pleasure ship from “historical document” thirty seven. (looks at a mirror) Oh and wait, wait, listen to this! (Looks up) Computer?

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER
dialogues.text: “Yes?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: What's the weather like outside?

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER
dialogues.text: There is no weather in space.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I never get tired of that joke.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Let me try. Computer? (no response) Computer?...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Only answers to me.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: That‘s ridiculous. I’m the Captain.  Jason 40.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: On the show I talk to the computer and repeat what it says. So that’s what they built.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Computer? COMPUTER?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Computer?

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: {singsong, teasing Jason) I can talk to the compuuuuter and youuuu Caaaan’t... smiles.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: So when are you going to tell them? The aliens.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Tell them? About...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Who we are. Don’t you think they’re going to be

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I’m net going to tell them.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Well you have to tell them. What if something happens? Something dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Then we'll take care of it.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: “We'll take care of it.” Listen to you. We’re actors. We’re not astronauts, we’re not adventurers... We pretend. We didn’t even write the scripts!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Look, these people are depending on us. They’ve structured their whole lives based on the show. I’m not going to be the one to bring their entire civilization crashing down just because of a little thing called the truth.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You want to play space man.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: They have a problem. We can help them.  41.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Are you nuts? We can’t do this stuff!

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: It’s not the STUFF. The STUFF isn’t the thing... I mean, anybody can learn the STUFF... The important thing is COMMITMENT. 99% of anything is just committing to it.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: 99% of ACTING is commitment. ACTING. Stella Adler never manned a neutron cannon, she taught ACTING...

dialogues.speaker: FASON
dialogues.text: Secretly you agree with me.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Secretly you know things about me is so smug I just wane to smack you right in your smug little-

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Do we have to always fight on the spaceship?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Computer do we always have to fight on the spaceship?

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER
dialogues.text: This is not required.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Well.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Well. They smile at each other. Gwen looks around, giddy.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: We're in space. A CREWMAN appears in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: CREWMAN
dialogues.text: Sir, Betzalar requests your presence on the command deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason and Gwen turn a corner and join up with Tommy, Alex Guy. They keep walking toward the command deck.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: I think we’re going to exit the space port.  42.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: That should be something to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter and gawk at the familiar hub, waiting for the start... not realizing they ARE the show.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: If you would all take your positions, we can exit the space port.

dialogues.speaker: THE ACTORS
dialogues.text: Oh, right... US! Yes, of course... US! They take their positions, marveling at the familiar cont panels in front of them. Tommy turns to Guy.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Look.. This thingy... I remember I had it all worked out... This was forward, this was back...

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Captain, some of the crew has requested to be present at this historic event. Betzalar motions and a few CREWMEN enter, followed by a d more... followed by FIFTY more. They stand around the per of the room, watching eagerly.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: {whispers to Guy) No pressure, huh? Glad I’m not the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Okay, Laredo, take her out. Everyone in the room turns their attention to Tommy. His Sarcastic smile drops. He looks mortified.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Excuse me?

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: They designed the ship from watching you. So... Take her out, Lieutenant... Tommy stares down at his control panel. It’s pretty self explanatory, a throttle and a circular dial for direction daunting nonetheless,

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Right. Okay, yeah, sure. Everyone’s eyes are glued to him as he moves the throttle slightly. The ENGINES COME TO LIFE, a massive exhilaratin Tommy giggles nervously.  43. His hand trembles as he pushes the throttle further. The start to move. Gwen and the others exchange worried glanc

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Oh god. Oh my god....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can feel the WEIGHT of the giant craft as it eases fo sliding through the sides of the dock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone watches the forward monitor. Tommy turns the NAV DIAL slowly. Guy whispers to him...

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: More to the left... Stay parallel...

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Hey, YOU want to drive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indeed, the ship is slightly off course... It’s like tryi out of a tight parking space with concrete walls to eithe And the ship is veering ever so slightly into one of the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tommy turns the dial to correct... But it looks like the might carry the ship into the wall anyway... Tommy PEGS t to the left... The others hold their breath as the bow of moves closer and closer to the wall... Will it correct in moves a hair’s width next to the wall... Then... It TOUCHES. The sound of a soft but high pitched SCRAAAAA

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Oh shit. 7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is stopped, just grazing the wall EVER SO SLIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes are on Tommy. He doesn’t know what to do... Shou continue forward, or back up, and scrape again for sure? classic parking lot dilemma, magnified by ten thousand. T grasps the throttle and moves it slightly forward... SCRA He keeps going, in too deep to back out now... And the sh continues to SCRAAAAAPE for a couple of horrible seconds completes the curve... .-.and then it is free. The beautiful craft glides slowly open space... Jason and the others let out a sigh of reli

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Very good Lieutenant. Forward Mark two...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tommy smiles, relieved. He pushes throttle to the *2”.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Mark two, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship glides out to space, only a relatively minor scr the paint job to show for the incident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crew and various aliens sit around the large table, e extravagant meal. Betzalar makes a toast.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: To our brave guests. Few in this universe have the opportunity to meet their heroes. We are blessed to count ourselves among them. Everyone clinks glasses. Quellek clinks glasses with Alex brimming with admiration. Tek turns to Tommy.

dialogues.speaker: TEK
dialogues.text: We are sorry about the instrumentation, Lt. Laredo. Obviously there must have been an alignment problem in the steerage mechanism.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Yes, well.. As long as it doesn’t happen again.

dialogues.speaker: TEK
dialogues.text: How are you enjoying your food, Lt. Madison?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Oh it’s fantastic. French is my favorite.

dialogues.speaker: TEK
dialogues.text: Yes, we programed the food sythesizer for each of you based on the regional menu of your birthplace. (turns to Alexander) Are you enjoying your Kep-mok bloodticks Dr. Lazarus? Alexander, miserable, toys with a bowl of living insects in a disgustingly vomit-textured broth.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Just like mother used to make. He pushes the bowl away, nauseated.

dialogues.speaker: ALEXANDER
dialogues.text: Tell me, Betzalar, this character we're flying to meet... Sarris... What is it he wants exactly?  45.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: For years, Sarris has plundered the resources of our planet: Our people, our technologies. We built this ship in order to find a new planet to settle. One far away from Sarris. We are not a people accustomed to confrontation. We are scientists. This ship was our salvation. A tick jumps off of Alexander’ spoon back into the soup.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: But Sarris found out about our plans just as we had completed construction of the Protector II. He heard about the device... The Omega 13.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: The Omega 13... Why does that sound so familiar?...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: The lest footage. At the convention. The mysterious device in our last episo-- historical document.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: What is it? What does it do?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: We don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: But... You built one, right?

dialogues.speaker: TEK
dialogues.text: We built... something.. from the blueprints and what references we could find on your internet... Our computer neural nets made educated guesses in areas we were uncertain. So there is actually much about the device we don’t even understand. We were hoping you could enlighten us.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Well, it’s... This was a device we... He looks around for someone to help him. Gwen just shrugs

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: ...discovered on an alien planet. We don’t know what it does either.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Why don’t you just turn it on, and see what it does?

dialogues.speaker: TEK
dialogues.text: It has at its core a reactor capable of generating unthinkable energy. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TEK (cont’d) . ' If we were mistaken in our construction by even the slightest calculation, the device would act as a molecular explosive, causing a chain reaction that would obliterate all matter in the universe.

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY
dialogues.text: Right, maybe nix on the turn it on thing then.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Betzalar?... Has Sarris seen the... historical records?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: No, Thank God he has not.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Then how did he find out about the device?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Our former Captain was not... Strong. Betzalar looks down, somber.

dialogues.speaker: JASON
dialogues.text: Former Captain?

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. You deserve to be shown. He nods to a Crewman who pushes a button and a wall panel aside to reveal a large viewscreen. An image appears on t screen with a lot of static, and the sound cuts in and ou

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: The tape was partially demagnetized as it was smuggled off of Sarris’ ship. But through the static we can make out an image: The form CAPTAIN, im ALIEN form, is strapped to a metal board. Eac wrists and ankles is secured with mechanical devices and in different directions.

dialogues.speaker: BETZALAR
dialogues.text: Qriginally, one of our own people tried to ead... In the IMAGE Sarris stands over the alien with a control

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS, (ON MONITOR)
dialogues.text: Is that all? You have no more to confess to me? No? After three days of this you still require incentive? Sarris moves switches on the panel. The device pulls at t alien’s limbs, twisting them horribly. Bones crackle.  a7.

dialogues.speaker: ALIEN CAPTAIN, (ON MONITOR)
dialogues.text: I say again... I have told you all I know! To my shame, I have told you everything. You must believe me.

dialogues.speaker: SARRIS
